name: Purpled Out [Facebook Purple/Pink Theme]
description:
This style turns your Facebook purple with pink hearts in the background.

Only real men (and ladies) use this theme. :P
additional_info:
This is the first theme I've ever made... hopefully I'll be releasing some quality ones soon!

I took the background from [[29501]]

This style was made for fun and there's probably issues. 
If you find anything that you'd like me to change/add, let me know.
